languages.text: Хейнрикс располагает данными о неких планах культа Последнего восхода, связанных с индустриальным миром Кьява Гамма. Будущая борьба с культом зависит от результатов поиска, ради которых дознаватель присоединился к свите Вольного Торговца.

Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс располагает данными о неких планах культа Последнего восхода, связанных с индустриальным миром Кьява Гамма. Будущая борьба с культом зависит от результатов поиска, ради которых дознаватель присоединился к свите Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: 海因里希手中掌握着部分线索，这些线索与“终末黎明”教派的计划有关。这个邪教的计划与工业世界基亚瓦伽马星的命运息息相关，若想摧毁邪教，海因里希的调查必不可少。他也正是出于这个原因，才加入了行商浪人的队伍。
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希手中掌握着部分线索，这些线索与“终末黎明”教派的计划有关。这个邪教的计划与工业世界基亚瓦伽马星的命运息息相关，若想摧毁邪教，海因里希的调查必不可少。他也正是出于这个原因，才加入了行商浪人的队伍。

languages.text: ハインリックスは、産業惑星キアヴァ・ガンマに関連した最後の夜明け教団の計画の一部に関する情報を持っている。教団との今後の闘いは彼の捜索結果次第であり、これこそが彼が自由開拓者の従者になった理由だ。
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスは、産業惑星キアヴァ・ガンマに関連した最後の夜明け教団の計画の一部に関する情報を持っている。教団との今後の闘いは彼の捜索結果次第であり、これこそが彼が自由開拓者の従者になった理由だ。

languages.text: Heinrix posee información sobre alguno de los planes del Culto del Amanecer Final. Dichos planes están relacionados con el mundo industrial de Kiava Gamma. La futura lucha contra el Culto dependerá de los resultados de su búsqueda, motivo por el que se une al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix posee información sobre alguno de los planes del Culto del Amanecer Final. Dichos planes están relacionados con el mundo industrial de Kiava Gamma. La futura lucha contra el Culto dependerá de los resultados de su búsqueda, motivo por el que se une al séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Heinrix hat Informationen über einige Pläne des Kultes der letzten Dämmerung. Pläne, die in Zusammenhang mit der Produktionswelt Kiava Gamma stehen. Das das zukünftige Ringen mit dem Kult von den Ergebnissen seiner Untersuchung abhängt, hat er sich der Entourage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angeschlossen.
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix hat Informationen über einige Pläne des Kultes der letzten Dämmerung. Pläne, die in Zusammenhang mit der Produktionswelt Kiava Gamma stehen. Das das zukünftige Ringen mit dem Kult von den Ergebnissen seiner Untersuchung abhängt, hat er sich der Entourage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angeschlossen.

languages.text: Heinrix détient des informations sur les plans du Culte de l'Aube finale, qui concerneraient le monde industriel de Kiava Gamma. L'avenir de la lutte menée contre le culte dépendra des résultats de cette enquête, c'est pourquoi il a rejoint l'escorte {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix détient des informations sur les plans du Culte de l'Aube finale, qui concerneraient le monde industriel de Kiava Gamma. L'avenir de la lutte menée contre le culte dépendra des résultats de cette enquête, c'est pourquoi il a rejoint l'escorte {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Heinrix, Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın Kiava Gama sınai dünyasıyla bağlantılı bazı planları hakkında bilgi sahibi olmuş. Tarikat ile ileride yaşanacak mücadelenin boyutunu, soruşturmasının sonuçları belirleyecek. Hür Tacir'in maiyetine de bu sebeple katılmış.
languages.original_text: Heinrix possesses information about some of the plans of the Cult of the Final Dawn, plans connected to the industrial world Kiava Gamma. The future struggle against the cult will depend on the results of his search, which is the reason for his joining the Rogue Trader's retinue.
